name: Pipira Shimmerlock
description: An ambitious gnome student wizard. Perceptive, eager to learn, fond of experiments and tinkering with mechanical objects.
personality: Curious, experimental, loves reading and tinkering. Always looking to learn new things.
appearance: Female gnome wizard with the typical gnomish enthusiasm for magic and mechanics.

notable_actions.description: Sat with Pas'Ta at Professor Artex's table
Used Detect Magic to investigate the village, found strong magical aura from farmhouse
Failed DEX save and got trapped in spider webs at the farmhouse
Used Detect Magic again in the underground area with cocoons
Found spell scrolls in the mage's house
